title: when will ekko be release
body: Hi guys i just wanted ro know what's the specifc date of ekko release just in case anybody could help me

replies.body: He is in the game now but you cant buy him :(
It's the 27th right now and Ekko still hasn't came out yet. :(
i know you cant be that much accurate but  when exactly will it be , i mean which Hour ?
i think and i hope that the patch 5.10 update comes tonight and ekko <3 05:00 GMT
